definition: service (on a train, a plane etc)
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc

sentences.english: The stewards had stuck sticky labels on the cargo.
sentences.chinese: 乘务员已经将粘性标签粘贴在货物上了。

sentences.english: One stewardess stands at the front cabin door to welcome the Passengers aboard.
sentences.chinese: 一位女乘务员站在机舱门口欢迎乘客登机。

sentences.english: The stewardess kindly brought me a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 女乘务员体贴地给我拿来了毯子。

sentences.english: The militants' attempt to hijack the plane was foiled by the flight crew, the official said.
sentences.chinese: 此官员说飞机乘务组挫败了劫持此飞机的企图。

sentences.english: Power of three helper locomotives into the hands of one engine crew .
sentences.chinese: 补机的动力掌控于一个乘务组之手。

sentences.english: Qatar Airways provides free transport for cabin crew for all official duties.
sentences.chinese: 卡航为乘务员的公务提供免费的交通。

sentences.english: The flight attendant asked the passengers to fasten their seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 飞机乘务员让乘客把安全带扣好。

sentences.english: This is Air China cabin crew chief, director of the voice of Kai-Yan.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国国际航空公司客舱部主任乘务长阎开的心声。

sentences.english: Ask the stewardess. She will know the answer.
sentences.chinese: 问女乘务员，她会知道答案。

sentences.english: About an hour later, the conductor began to check tickets.
sentences.chinese: 大约一小时后，乘务员开始查票。

sentences.english: Excuse me, are you the purser?
Of course, the woman protests and report these indecent acts to the flight attendant.
sentences.chinese: 显然，女子抗议，并报告了乘务员的猥亵行为。

sentences.english: We are all crew. — Marshall McLuhan
They waited for the crew chief to give the signal to throw the rope.
sentences.chinese: 他们等待着乘务长发出抛下绳索的信号。

sentences.english: Jimmy Doolittle told his crews where they were going only after the carrier was at sea.
sentences.chinese: 吉米在航空母舰开进大海后才告诉乘务员们要去哪里。

sentences.english: The huge aliens came up to the crew.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的异形向乘务员方向而来。

definition: attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
abbr. for 空中小姐/stewardess/air hostess/female flight attendant
